=Guideline for Webpage Colors=

We use a green and yellow color scheme for the MolTK web sites,  Based on the Sahara theme from http://www.freecsstemplates.org/.

==Background Colors==

Large sections of background should use the gradient image a3.gif from the modified Sahara style. http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/css/sahara/images/a3.gif

{{{
body 
{
    background-color: LightYellow;
    background-image: url('images/a3.gif');
    background-repeat: repeat-x;
}
}}}

==Text Colors==

{{{
a:link {color: DarkGreen;}
}}}


{{{
a:visited {color: Green;}
}}}


{{{
a:hover	{text-decoration: none;}
}}}

==Menu Colors==

White text on green background.

{{{
menu bar
{
	background-color: DarkOliveGreen;
	background-image: url('images/a1.gif');
	background-repeat: repeat-x;
	color: #ffffff;
}
}}}

{{{
menu bar: hover
{
	background-color: #515815;
	background-image: url('images/a2.gif');
	background-repeat: repeat-x;
}
}}}
http://www.color-hex.com/color/515815
